website_summaries.verdict: One of the largest massage balls on the market that provides enhanced deep tissue massage thanks to its superior gripping power.
pros: Offers a 4.75-inch diameter so it can cover large areas
Made of thermoplastic rubber and features unique treads to increase its gripping power
Also available in smaller sizes and sets with multiple balls
Can help improve joint movement and increase post-workout recovery time
cons: Some users find the balls to be slightly too hard to be comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Great set of balls
customer_reviews.text: Good variety. I like the stimulation of the knobby ball and I like the way the double balls work over the spine. The smooth single ball is a good alternative to the knobby ball for those who might be too sensitive for the pointed knobs but I like the knobs, they are a little rough but satisfying. My dog seems to love these balls. When he sees me take my balls out, he wants to chew on them so the included ball sack is great. I just hang the ball sack up out of his reach. So if you have a dog that loves balls you'll definitely want to keep your balls tucked away in the sack.
customer_reviews.author: Lens F.

customer_reviews.title: Meh, might be okay if it didn't have a felt covering.
customer_reviews.text: Just about what I was looking for, except it has a felt-like covering over which isn't apparent in the picture. Why does this matter, you may ask? Because it on traditional slick matting - like most gyms use - it just slides around under you if you try to roll over it. It's possible that on yoga style rubber matting it would work just fine. But I wouldn't be thrilled with the cleaning the felting either.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great set for plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Great set for plantar fasciitis. I use the peanut first then the rubber ball then the spiky ball. The smooth balls are hard rubber and they have a small amount of give. Yes they may pick up lint but who cares? You are using them on your feet. The spiky ball is hard plastic with no give but it feels good on your feet. Three balls and a bag for the price of one ball from other manufacturers- a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: q

customer_reviews.title: Great used right before bed
customer_reviews.text: Quality product! 4kor where have you been all my life! With helpful YouTube videos and these wonder balls, I've able to work successfully on knots that I thought were permanent. Really helps release stored tension trigger points in my shoulders and neck and back. I've found it helps to alleviate intensity of my migraines that begin in those areas too. Great used right before bed, promotes really good sleep for me. Hope this helps someone else. I purchased this product and the review is my honest opinion!
customer_reviews.author: t_mum

customer_reviews.title: I sit much too much and have terrible lower back tightness
customer_reviews.text: They work! I sit much too much and have terrible lower back tightness. Laying down on the lacrosse and single ball helps to relieve tension. I was trying tennis balls but they're much too squishy to do anything. These are Goldilocks, not too soft and not too hard. The spiky ball is too squishy for my back; but it's intended as a foot massager. It works well too as a massager because I get that itchy blood flowing result.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I am prone to pinched nerves in my shoulders from less-than-perfect posture at work. I use the single ball to help massage my shoulders after work regularly and it has improved my comfort significantly. Plus the spiked ball feels amazing on my feet. I use these after workouts (I do Pilates which can lead to some knots if I don't keep up regularly) and after a shower. The workout tips in the package have been helpful, and the bag they came in helps keep things tidy.
customer_reviews.author: GP in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Amaze-balls no pun intended!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!. The smaller smooth ball works wonders on my feet, and the medium sized one is incredible for getting really targeted and intense trigger point relief. The largest one is a replacement for a similar product that I used so much it split in half (haha). I am thrilled with this set and use it almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Personal Masseuse in the Bag
customer_reviews.text: If your muscles are tight or you have knots at specific muscle bundles or trigger points, the fireball mobility ball set is the thing for you. Whether in the gym or at home, use any available flat surface and roll away those tight muscles. I have been happy with the twin balls for my back, the singular lacrosse ball for specific or pointed areas and the spiky ball is a wonderful tool for the large muscle groups like quads, calves, and hamstrings. Mobility is key because you can use them anywhere. Either use them by using your own body weight to apply pressure or use your hands where possible. Roll away relief.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A Peart

customer_reviews.title: Just wash them and you are good to go
customer_reviews.text: Spikey ball could be a bit harder but still loving it. The other two are just right- very hard - could have been a bit larger. Other reviewers said that they attract lint but all of these do. Just wash them and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pham

customer_reviews.title: Great for massaging our knots!
customer_reviews.text: Great for massaging out knots and releasing tension from your muscles! I like how it comes in a bundle. I usually use the single lacrosse ball for travel as my lower back tightens a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy Lau

customer_reviews.title: Get those knots out!
customer_reviews.text: If you think that a foam roller is enough to get those knots out of you, you're in for a surprise. Since I started using these daily, I've had a noticeable decrease in back pain and glute soreness, especially immediately after a heavy squat or deadlift day. I use the peanut roller even more than I thought I would, the the spiky ball is perfect for the soles of your feet after a long day.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: these are so amazing for upper body where a foam roller just can't ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after a recommendation from my trainer to start doing myofascial release . Took me a while to figure out how to use these , these are so amazing for upper body where a foam roller just can't reach. Also The spiky one feels really good on your heels after a long 12 hour hospital day! And dogs seem to love the spiky one if you're rolling it around on their back and belly :)
customer_reviews.author: Book lover!

customer_reviews.title: Streamlined and helps to work out muscle tension
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product -- I use these massage balls at the end of my yoga routine to work out knots in my back and shoulders. I love the different size options and the product has a nice weight and is smooth to the touch but with just enough traction. Amazing product. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Wembs

customer_reviews.title: The 4 Kor massage balls are great!
customer_reviews.text: I had a TKR recently and during my surgery my sciatica nerve was affected. During one of my physical therapy sessions they gave me the red 4 Kor ball to use. It was amazing the difference it made on my nerve pain. I ordered it immediately when I got home and have used it as part of my exercise daily. My husband uses the middle size ball for his shoulder pain and we both use the smallest ball for our feet. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We really love these massage balls! They're great sizes and the different styles offer a good level of flexibility to massage different pain points. The double ball has become a definite favorite and is great for back massages, or a less intense leg massage. The two single balls definitely pack a punch! The material is relatively hard but has a nice rubbery texture which stops them from slipping around too much. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Just what you need to really dig in.
customer_reviews.text: Use all of these, almost every day, and they seem to really help muscle soreness. Have some foam rollers and an inflatable ball, and they work, but the 4kor massage balls get things that the others can't. Wish I would have had these for the last 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: A 4 KOR SCORE!
customer_reviews.text: As a crossfitter, my upper back, shoulders and legs are usually tight. The 4KOR fitness set is great because of the versatility it provides . The peanut is perfect to roll out the muscles along the spine. The single lacross ball and trigger point ball work really well digging into isolated spots in the back, chest or legs where a foam roller can't give you that pressure. Definitely worth the money if your all about mainting mobility and flexibility !
customer_reviews.author: Donald Fox

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: These balls don’t get the part I need and are not as flexible as I would like them so unfortunately they are going back
customer_reviews.author: KAY

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 4KOR 4.75" firm Fireball, 3.2" firm Fireball, and Lacrosse Ball set. Very happy with my purchase. Well made, firm and grippy. I use them almost daily to help relive pain and tension. I especially like using the 4KOR 4.75" firm Fireball for my glutes and hamstrings.
customer_reviews.author: Maria V. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. I have a lot of problems with ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. I have a lot of problems with my posterior chain, so my lower back is frequently in pain. These are great for breaking down the scar tissue. And they are portable and convenient! Definitely recommend for anyone interested in better health.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Way

customer_reviews.title: Works great - 5 stars! I would give their customer service (thanks Nadia) 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.text: Works great - 5 stars! I would give their customer service (thanks Nadia) 6 stars if I could. I purchased several sets and had received the older version set as well as the updated version set but needed them to be matching. Nadia right away corrected it and went above and beyond any expectations in customer service. Buy with confident from 4KOR Fitness!
customer_reviews.author: Dan's Review

customer_reviews.title: Great balls!
customer_reviews.text: These balls are great. The bag they come in is pretty cheap and not really worth keeping, my favorite (and the one I really wanted to buy) is the single non spikey ball. The others are fine, but don't get nearly as much use.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: The new fashion accessory for anyone who wants to protect soft tissue.
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea how bad I needed these until I started using them. I’ve been suffering from sciatica due to some herniated discs, and I am willing to try anything and everything. These balls are awesome. I carry one with me everywhere. I sit on one in meetings- kind of like the princess and the pea.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine FRAZER

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Seriously, just buy them. When anyone tells me that they are having back pain or a pinched nerve, I tell them to buy these. I was so skeptical at first when my husband told me about these balls, now I use them all the time. They have been so helpful for pinched nerves in my back. They are also great for sore muscles. Love love love these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel & Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it, have never found it something comparable.
customer_reviews.text: Best myofascial release , the only one I found that gets the muscles right below the scapula in your back.
customer_reviews.author: Son of Barra

customer_reviews.title: Absolute must have for anyone dealing with pain!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in my 30s and suffer from chronic pain and multiple injuries to my neck, back and knee. These are crucial for me. What a difference they make if you’re using them on a regular basis. Really love these. Better than the ones my PT office has. The double racquetball is my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Haddock

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: OK to me a little hard but I feel that's what is needed to release the tension that builds up in you're back my back is like a rock this releases my rock hard back but OUCH till things soften up and release.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Webb

customer_reviews.title: Love these little balls
customer_reviews.text: I love using these balls after my rebounding and jump rope workouts, in particular. Let's say that I notice the difference when I don't implement my balls into my post workout routine like I'm supposed to. If you're thinking of getting these get them, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best peanut. Pictures wrong. Other options have a different peanut.
customer_reviews.text: Best peanut on the market. Pictures are decieving, this peanut comes with a spacer and is the perfect size. Others of the same brand have a different with. Have recommended to several people who have also bought it. I personally have 3. One at home, one at the office, and one for travel.
customer_reviews.author: David Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: love'm
customer_reviews.text: These are a great deal, plus these guys all have excellent texture and firmness for soft tissue mobilization. I use the spikey one for a scalp massage.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: My trapezuis thanks you!
customer_reviews.text: These things are the best accessory to my gym bag yet! I really can't believe I didn't buy these sooner, they make self myofascial and trigger point releases so much easier. Especially for harder areas, because they can get in just about anywhere with ease and precision.
customer_reviews.author: Knurlgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good self-massage tools
customer_reviews.text: These are HARD, which as they should be, much better than tennis balls. The single and double balls are very effective, but I'm not sure exactly what to do with the pointy one. It's a bit too threatening for my muscle knots.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I especially like using it in the car when I am usually ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't leave home without my balls. No really, I bring one with me everywhere. I especially like using it in the car when I am usually stressed and in traffic. It makes for a much more enjoyable commute home.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Black

customer_reviews.title: Necessity
customer_reviews.text: I run a lot and these balls work great. The peanut shape is good for your shins. I originally just needed the normal lacrosse to roll out my feet since my plantar fascia had become inflamed from long runs. Now that I've been working on rolling my feet out, there have been a lot less problems with it. Taking care of your body is important, if you work out I recommend getting a set.
customer_reviews.author: Kymber

customer_reviews.title: Robust Balls
customer_reviews.text: These balls are well made and I would recommend as they seem to be of comparable quality to my physical therapy office. They do seem a little expensive, but are well worth it if you plan on actually using it.
customer_reviews.author: Phillyzee

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice quality. They are great for pain relief and physical therapy. I would recommend. I like that I can use different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: S_Chamberlainky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for several different applications
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for plantar fasitis issues and each item works well for stretching out my feet. I have also used it on my back and shoulders for muscle pain. The more I use them, the better I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna R.

customer_reviews.title: Massage balls for my sore muscles
customer_reviews.text: I sometimes get tight or knotted muscles due my running hobby. These come in handy in releasing that tension.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Wigand

customer_reviews.title: Worth Your Money!!!
customer_reviews.text: This right here is the game changer!!! I've been having lower back problem and been looking for one of these, forgot i had an amazon lol. The thickness is on point, the small one for you feet really does what it meant to do.
customer_reviews.author: Sai

customer_reviews.title: Lower Back Tension Gone!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent the last month using these to fix my lower tension. I had so many knots in my I.T. bands and gluteus. Doing a lot more streching too. THESE ARE A MUST!!! Highly recommend. I also bought 2 Orb balls.
customer_reviews.author: B. SAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Very awesome set!
customer_reviews.text: Very awesome set!! I use them all for different things. Amazing for the glutes and I love using the solid single one for exercising my wrist strength. But nothing feels better than rolling out the hard worked muscles!! Really loving everything I've used of 4 KOR! So durable and comfortable for all different stuff! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have..if you really need instant relief.
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! When my feet hurt or I feel tightness on my calves..grab this pair of massaging balls and let me tell you ....Total relieve. Must have.
customer_reviews.author: EVELYN

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting. These are th me same hard rubber material of a lacrosse ball. Perfectly shaped and sized groove on the peanut massager ball.. fits around my spine perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Amaze-balls
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty quad dominant and foam rolling just isn't cutting it anymore. The fireball is the only thing other than my Doctor that really gets into the tightest spot on my quad on releases tension. My knee pain from tightness is kept away thanks to these babies. Not to mention they feel fantastic everywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Feel like the price is a little too high but it's worth it. It is very stiff so if you are looking for something soft look elsewhere. Its painful but I feel worth it. It hits my calves and hips just how I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: louie

customer_reviews.title: High quality cost effective!
customer_reviews.text: Often the older tennis ball or "peanut" used for rolling out tight muscles were always slipping all over the place. These recovery balls are awesome because 1) they come in multiple sizes so you can change up your focus and 2) have a nice, clean rubber finish to them so they do not slip n slide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: over priced
customer_reviews.text: good quality, but useless, and easy to replace by other cheap stuff, like kid toy!
customer_reviews.author: ellen li

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little massage ball set. Comes in a convenient little bag that makes it easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McNeil

customer_reviews.title: 4KOR Fitness Ultimate Massage Balls for Physical Therapy - Deep Tissue Trigger Point
customer_reviews.text: Great Product Balls , Works Well, Good For Physical Therapy And Deep Tissue Trigger point Painful Release. I Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hang Tang

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Must have for any active fitness person. I use it daily and it works great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joey M

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality balls and good variety for the price. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: chris b

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use them under my desk almost every day, helps after long runs, works on back against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: sabinanners

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal in a great little kit.
customer_reviews.author: K Yates

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my shins less splinty
customer_reviews.text: I'm out of shape and get shin splints far more often than any normal human should. I use these to help loosen my shin muscles and it gets rid of my shin pain like nothing else. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Package was received very promptly. These massage balls are awesome for working out kinks wherever you have them and really helping with mobility. Much more better for targeting a specific muscle / location than just a foam roller would be. No more using lacrosse balls for this purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and work well as long as you keep at it.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for on these. A bit more expensive but very nice message balls.
customer_reviews.author: scaryd

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!!!! These are Amazing!!!! I am a nurse and after coming home from a long 12 hour shift I came home to receiving these in the mail & was so excited to try them out! I LOVE them!!!! Great for massaging feet, back, glutes, entire body!!!!! ❤ Highly recommend!!!! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.author: phillip scott

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool
customer_reviews.text: Still figuring out how to best use them, but so far, so good. I do feel like they are useful in loosening tight muscles. I bought them on the recommendation of my massage therapist.
customer_reviews.author: Juniper

customer_reviews.title: A very effective tool
customer_reviews.text: I'm just starting to use the 4KOR Fitness Ultimate Massage Ball, but it seems like a very effective tool to relieve some of my lower back problems.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Steven Moskowitz

customer_reviews.title: More Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find a large lacrosse-ball hard massage ball. Looked and looked. Nadia, in seller's customer service, promised me it would be what I was looking for or would make it right. Ball was more than right. Great product with great customer service. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Pam:)

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this set. I use the equipment to help me roll out my muscles before and after workouts. Helps with mobility and muscle stiffness. The quality of the products are great. You can definitely tell a lot of thought went into the design. Although you might be thinking it’s just a ball.. it’s not! It’s legit
customer_reviews.author: Shane Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Love that you get so many different balls to use
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Gese

customer_reviews.title: It's a great set. The single ball works great while sitting ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great set. The single ball works great while sitting and rolling it across the hamstrings. The double works wonders on the neck and spine, when laying on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Coloradohiker55

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. Quality product that came in a drawstring bag along with some simple instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya Business

customer_reviews.title: Good product , great physical therapy.
customer_reviews.text: Works great will rub out tight spots nice quality and sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Nightmission

customer_reviews.title: Nice sore muscle relief
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Nice relief for sore muscles. Wish it had an instructional video.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Steinberg

customer_reviews.title: Bonus ball!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy to have found this set. I was originally only looking for the single Lacrosse ball but my girlfriend raves about the double ball. So finding the 2 together for a great price was awesome. I see the spikey ball as a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Alex England

customer_reviews.title: great set. very happy
customer_reviews.text: great set. very happy. I love the peanut balls for rolling out my calves, I have another single ball so this one from the set makes two. I use them to get pressure points equally on my upper back and the single one is the best thing Ive used for self massage. I have some ribs that like to come out, but if I keep up on massaging my pecks and back they dont really bother me
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Song Jasky-Zuber

customer_reviews.title: RIP DOMS
customer_reviews.text: Great for getting DEEP into the tissue. You'll feel so relieved after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Gholampour

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for home care
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Certainly has assisted with my muscular issues in my back, hip etc.
customer_reviews.author: D.W.

customer_reviews.title: teh different balls in here allow for more flexibility in ...
customer_reviews.text: teh different balls in here allow for more flexibility in massage, ny fiance had surgery recently and definetly needed these to release some of the muscle tension he has in his shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Angela V.

customer_reviews.title: Order for the wife who has back and shoulder pain ...
customer_reviews.text: Order for the wife who has back and shoulder pain. She said it works really well. Only been a couple weeks, but she feels improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Recommend! Great price for all it brings
customer_reviews.text: Recommend! Great price for all it brings, does the job! hard lacrosse balls ( perfect ). Fast Shipping. Love it and it helps alot!
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really used the spikey one yet. Don't know what to do with that. Kinda expensive but they won't wear out. Spend once.
customer_reviews.author: That guy

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for any athlete
customer_reviews.text: Great set for a deeper muscle roll out than my foam roller. Works hard to reach areas for better relief on my tricep and calves. Very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for lats and armpit release
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunch of these massage balls but this one seems the best for my lats and armpit area. Feels like heaven
customer_reviews.author: Blayne S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: We train professional athletes and utilize almost all 4kor products , the message balls are great for recovery following a tough session ! Highly recommend and love the variety for different spaces for myofascial release !
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: The  fireball is the best one.
customer_reviews.text: I like my set, of a foam, fireball and lacrosse ball. However if you only need one, get the fireball.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Leo

customer_reviews.title: Balls.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about. They do what they are meant to if you know how to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great set and reasonably priced over buying each item on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great set and reasonably priced over buying each item on its own. The peanut is great for working on the muscles on either side of the spine. This set is all you need to work out all those kinks and knots that impair your athletic performance. The spiky ball is softer than the others (thankfully) so it is not like lying on a mace.
customer_reviews.author: Ken C

customer_reviews.title: Collects Lint and Dust
customer_reviews.text: This one collects an incredible amount of lint and dust as you are using it, compared the Champion lacrosse ball that I have.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what I expected from these but I had been using a tennis ball previously. Super high quality. Nice carry bag. Quick ship. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Geyerman

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This product helped me a lot with my muscle pain. Good quality. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Bunbunnysmile

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed. I used to be a ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I used to be a tennis ball user and decides to splurge. Definitely a worthwhile investment in yourself
customer_reviews.author: Neeson

customer_reviews.title: Seriously amazing!! I have multiple long term pains that ...
customer_reviews.text: Seriously amazing!! I have multiple long term pains that these have helped to mitigate in a matter of days!! You can't go wrong on these for $20, that's less than the cost of a trip to the chiropractor!!
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have the stiffest back & it’s extremely hard to pop! After rolling on this a couple of time my back popped so easy & I feel so much better! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kami Bill

customer_reviews.title: I love these balls
customer_reviews.text: I love these balls. They reduced the time of healing after a back strain. I just laid on the the peanut for hours. I lost the single ball though very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Works great, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no complaints. This is the exact type of ball I used while I was in Physical therapy for a back problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ray S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. High quality, with a nice cinch sack for storage. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gregshock

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these instead of the ones from Rogue fitness - basically the same, at a fraction of the cost. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: Finally a product I can use to release my pressure points. I'll never leave home without them.
customer_reviews.author: David Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product, has a softer ball that’s still decently firm and a firmer ball along with the peanut shaped roller and was definitely worth the value.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas staples

customer_reviews.title: Rough but amazing
customer_reviews.text: great quality and easy to use at the gym/home/ if you really wanted to work. The different sizes gives you the opportunity to hit every spot and angle.

product_meta.title: 4KOR Fitness Ultimate Massage Balls for Physical Therapy - Deep Tissue Trigger Point Myofascial Release Tools - Back, Shoulder & Foot Muscle Massager Kit - Enhanced Gripping Mobility Rubber Balls
feature_bullets: LARGEST 4KOR FIREBALL - The 4.75 inch 4KOR FIREBALL is the largest deep tissue massage ball of it’s kind. The gripping power of the thermoplastic rubber tread is what sets this ball apart. This is a FIRM, trigger point massage ball, made of thermoplastic rubber (TPR), and measures 4.75 inches in diameter. Our German designed massage ball is made to provide a super deep tissue massage with it’s unique grip-strong TPR tread.

INTENSE, EFFECTIVE, AND EFFICIENT TYPE OF DEEP TISSUE THERAPY - The 4KOR Fireball is designed to pick up where the lacrosse ball left off- generating higher global shear pressures for an intense, effective, and efficient type of deep tissue therapy.

UNIQUE MASSAGE GRID - The 4KOR Fireball offers an alternative to traditional foam rollers and massage balls, with a unique grip-strong TPR tread, and an innovative groove pattern for deep tissue therapy.
